Minister of Education to challenge amount awarded to school counsellors, Kath and Ron Cronin-Lampe, for workplace stress https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/minister-of-education-seeks-leave-to-challenge-record-amount-awarded-to-school-counsellors-for-workplace-stress/I3AVMW4DDRAF3LCTQSR2A4AJSU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/minister-of-education-seeks-leave-to-challenge-record-amount-awarded-to-school-counsellors-for-workplace-stress/I3AVMW4DDRAF3LCTQSR2A4AJSU/ Catherine HuttonKath and Ron Cronin-Lampe were awarded damages after dealing with 32 deaths. Mon, 15 Jul 2024 17:00:00 +0000 Ron Cronin-Lampe (left) and Kath Cronin-Lampe (right) were counsellors at Melville High School. The Minister of Education is seeking leave from the Court of Appeal to appeal the earlier Employment Court decision which awarded them almost $1.8 million in damages for workplace stress. Photo / Supplied
